tags: TRM TECHNOLOGIES INC., Tech4soft Inc., I4C
full_summary:
# National Capital Region Contract Notice

## Tender Details

*   **Title**: Information Technology Supports and Specialized Services 
*   **Reference Number**: cb-5677-97135775
*   **Publication Date**: 2023-05-18
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-05-25T11:00:00
*   **Amendment Number**: 1
*   **Solicitation Number**: S4457543
*   **Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defense

## Request for Proposal (RFP)

The Department of National Defense (DND) is seeking a contractor to provide temporary IT support services and personnel to the National Capital Region. The services required include:

*   Two (2) Computer Application Support Specialists (Category 5.1 - Senior)
*   One (1) Specialized Advisor (Category 13.9 - Senior)

## Background

The Request for Proposal (RFP) is based on a Supply Arrangement (EN578-172870) issued by the Government of Canada. Suppliers who are qualified under the specific streams and categories listed above have been invited to submit a proposal.

## Proposal Requirements

Proposals must be submitted electronically in accordance with the instructions provided in the RFP document. The winning contractor will be selected based on the lowest price.

## Security Clearance

The successful contractor will be required to have enhanced reliability clearance.

## Links

*   The RFP document is available on the Canada Buys website at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5677/s4457543---rfp.pdf
*   The Notice of Opportunity is available on the Canada Buys website at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5677/s4457543---dp.pdf

The Department of National Defense reserves the right to revise or withdraw the RFP at any time. By submitting a proposal, the contractor acknowledges that they have read and understood the terms and conditions of the RFP.

**Note**: All intellectual property rights for this document reside with the Government of Canada. This document is provided under the Open Government Licence. You can view the full version at: https://www.tbs-sct.gc.ca/open-government/ The Government of Canada is committed to making its digital information available and accessible. For more information or to provide feedback about this document, please contact: CFSG(O-G) Temp Help CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp
